author: Ed Saffle
comment: Best player app for me. I've been using it for about a year. I like that it supports android auto, reads my music collection from the sd card, and has a reasonable simple-to-use interface. The only problem I have is that the recent version stopped keeping track of where I am in the default "All Music" playlist; I need to reselect it and start from the beginning every time.   2017-12-07 - It has stopped working with Android Auto. It freezes when I access the playlist menu. I'm using a MotoX Pure edition running Android 7.

reply.author: MobiDev Corporation
reply.content:
Hello Ed! 
Our developers have been notified about the problem. 
Thanks for letting us know!

author: Mark Clemons
comment: Crashes android auto when selecting "folder/play list" from side menu. Artist songs mixed alphabetically instead of proper "artist-album-song# order. Samsung S7 edge android 7.0 verizon. Still looking for a touch menu driven local storage music player for android auto. Because google music doesn't know how to play albums that have the same title as one of their songs.

reply.author: MobiDev Corporation
reply.content:
Hi, Mark! 
Thank you for your feedback. 
Our developers have been notified about the issue.  
Many thanks in advance.

author: Octavio Polo Montoya
comment: I think is one of the best music app out there, great design and easy to use. But I have to give it this review because I have problems with Android Auto, sometimes I can only play one song in Android Auto and after the first one the next song doesn't sound.  2018/02/25: Hi! my device is a Honor 8 with Android 7.0

reply.author: MobiDev Corporation
reply.content:
Hi Octavio Polo Montoya! 
Thank you for your feedback. Our developers have been notified about the issue. Would you please indicate your device and operating system version? 
Many thanks in advance.

comment: Downloaded for Android Auto, but it doesn't resume playback or remember the last played song. Playlists are not separated from the folders/albums list, meaning more scrolling to listen to what you want. Could definitely use more work, but it lets me play all my music whereas Play Music won't.

reply.author: MobiDev Corporation
reply.content:
Hi! 
Thanks for your feedback! We've recently fixed this problem. 
If it occurs again, please let our support know by this e-mail: mobidevpublisher@gmail.com

author: Kevin Liu
comment: Overall it serves it's purpose (playing music) and I am able to use it with Android Auto.  Few issues that I think that developer can fix and make this app better: 1) Not able to edit the created playlist. User can only create a new list, add more songs into the existing list or delete the list entirely. User should be able to remove songs from the existing list. 2) The "repeat one" function does not work properly, it stops playing after completing the entire song. 3) While resuming the app, it freezes occasionally.  4) My pending play list sometimes became empty while resuming the app.

reply.author: MobiDev Corporation
reply.content:
Hi Kevin Liu! 
Thank you for your feedback. Our developers have been notified about the issue. 
Would you please indicate your device and operating system version? 
Many thanks in advance.

author: Jason H
comment: I use this with Android Auto... It works but browsing for playlists, artists, and albums is a mess. Everything is dumped into one long list. No organization. So I can play songs, but finding specific things is not practical.  It needs proper organization and browsing categories. Artist/Playlists/Albums/etc when used with Android Auto.

author: Aaron Moorley
comment: One of the best music apps I've used, other than a very large flaw - if you leave the phone not playing music for over about half an hour, it clears the now playing list (doesn't resume playback when you next press play). This sucks when driving and trying to listen to music.  I wrote another review previously, and the developer assured me that the issue had been resolved, and the app required an update, though as of yet, I am still yet to actually receive an update, and even when trying to contact the developer directly, have received no response, even after a month and a followup.  Definitely would give five stars IF the app worked as intended, and so far, unfortunately, at this time, I cannot give that, at least until there is an update provided.

author: mars sien
comment: Make lg g6 freeze often on the lock screen, still not resume if closed and reopen on android auto, shuffle do not handle all songs got like 7000 and always repeating the same 500 approx, cannot sort all music by folders , shuffle need some work... Shuflle + never repeat same song dont work well and does not save to resume after resarting apps. But is the best player for android auto. Keep the good work going guys!!!! Android 7.0, kernel 3.18.31 Build NRD90U, soft H87310h

reply.author: MobiDev Corporation
reply.content:
Hi mars sien! 
Thank you for your feedback. 
Our developers have been notified about the issue. Would you please indicate operating system version? 
Many thanks in advance.

author: iscariot TF
comment: This would be a fantastic app if it wasn't so painfully slow when going to folders.  I thought it crashed the first time I did it, but it takes 1-5 minutes to show you a folder listing when you tap the menu.

author: Joren Rapini
comment: This app worked great for a while, but recently the Android auto implementation has been broken, never retains memory of what you were playing so you have to start all over again anytime you switch apps or disconnect the phone. Also it no longer lets you limit folders for music library, it immediately adds the folder back for your entire phone's storage, totally negating the functionality.

reply.author: MobiDev Corporation
reply.content:
Hi Joren! 
Thank you for your feedback. 
Our developers have been notified about the issue. Would you please indicate your device and operating system version? 
Many thanks in advance.

author: Sarah Blatter
comment: I really like the set up and UI! It would be great if you could edit the metadata -- the track info button is right there on the play screen already. Also the ability to reorder the now playing queue would be nice. I like that you can specify folders to exclude/include. The driving mode screen is a nice touch.

author: Christian Roy
comment: This app would be perfect if you could delete songs from your device or SD card. I load my phone with a lot of mp3 songs and it would be nice to be able to delete a song if it plays and I decide I don't like it. Other music apps have this feature. Please consider adding it.

author: Marc LaBelle
comment: App only shows folder, no sorting by artist/album.
.FLAC files don't show up at all in the library. Only mp3 files are working. All other music players I have installed can detect the files except md player.

reply.author: MobiDev Corporation
reply.content:
Hi! 
Thank you for your interest in MD Player app and your question! 
For now, we support next audio formats aac, mp3, m4a, wav, ogg, flac.
On our part, we’ll consider your question as a hint for our further app development. We hope you enjoy using MD Player and will stay tuned for any future changes it will have!
